abstract: The sale of a division that finances leveraged buyouts would be part of General Electric’s plan announced in April to refocus on its industrial roots.
snippet: The sale of a division that finances leveraged buyouts would be part of General Electric’s plan announced in April to refocus on its industrial roots.
lead_paragraph: General Electric is near a deal to sell the bulk of a division that finances leveraged buyouts to a major Canadian pension fund, people briefed on the matter said on Sunday, as the industrial giant seeks to shed most of its GE Capital finance arm.

headline.main: G.E. Nears Deal on Major Step in Retreat From Banking
headline.print_headline: G.E. Nears Sale of Private Equity Lender

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
